document_data.name: Displacement
document_data.mainbody: '''''Displacement''''' was a [[spell]] that replicated the natural displacement ability of a [[displacer beast]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster to project an illusion of themself anywhere within {{SI|2|ft|long=yes}} of their actual location. The caster was still vulnerable to being detected normally by other creatures. If a ''[[true seeing]]'' spell was cast by another, they would be able to see the true location of the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[material component|material]] components, which was a strip of leather made from the hide of a displacer beast. It had to be twisted into a loop.
